name: The Little Match Girl
text:
Awakening X: When this card enters your field, search your main deck for up to X cards named "Magic Matchstick", reveal them and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
Awakening X: When this card enters your field, put X target cards named "Magic Matchstick" from your graveyard into your hand.
Discard a card named "Magic Matchstick": This card deals 400 damage to target J/resonator.
